Posts.Content: On Sep 04, 2008 12:00 AM freyja wrote: I have just been diagnosed with a HER-2 positive breast tumor, stage 3, and I just started TCH chemo once every 3 weeks and herceptin once a week, which will continue after the chemo ends and I have my mastectomy and lymph node removal.  I'll be interested to hear more here about your progress.   Hi I am in the same boat with you . I am 44 and just found out HER2 postive with lymth nodes and spreading to other breast. I know u and me are scared but we have to stay positive. Did you so the movie on HER2 with Dr Daniel Salmon that gave me hope. I am scared too . I have chemo to shrink the cancer then I am going to have a double mastacomy and reconstruction.. We have to stay strong because theres only you the drugs faith and you . YOU are worth it to fight with everything I know its going to be a battle I am single with a child so I am going to get friends to help me., I am getting them all together for a meeting we are still in charge  of our lives and we have choices cancer is going to be pushed away herceptain hopefully has given us more life we can do this ............
Posts.Title: herceptin
